video.title: The Killing
video.synopsis: Seattle homicide detectives Sarah Linden and Stephen Holder are deeply affected by the murders they investigate in this dark, acclaimed crime series.

episodes.synopsis: On her last day of work, Seattle homicide detective Sarah Linden is drawn into a new case involving a teenage girl's disappearance.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: The murder investigation begins as Linden and Holder question Rosie's parents, her friends and City Councilman Darren Richmond.
episodes.title: The Cage

episodes.synopsis: City Councilman Richmond suspects a leak within his team, causing a shakeup in his campaign.
episodes.title: El Diablo

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder pressure Jasper for answers and interview a new suspect.
episodes.title: A Soundless Echo

episodes.synopsis: Rosie's teacher provides Linden and Holder with a new piece of evidence.
episodes.title: Super 8

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder question a suspect's family and neighbors.
episodes.title: What You Have Left

episodes.synopsis: The police learn more about Rosie's whereabouts on the night of her death.
episodes.title: Vengeance

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder evade the FBI and unearth new evidence.
episodes.title: Stonewalled

episodes.synopsis: The cops are stymied while trying to make an arrest, and the Larsens -- who are fed up with the police -- take matters into their own hands.
episodes.title: Undertow

episodes.synopsis: While the cops regroup, Richmond goes up in the polls. Meanwhile, Stan faces consequences for his actions.
episodes.title: I'll Let You Know When I Get There

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder learn more about Rosie. But the investigation gets stalled when they have to go in search of Jack, who has disappeared.
episodes.title: Missing

episodes.synopsis: The police connect Rosie to a suspicious Web site, and Stan faces his demons. Meanwhile, Mitch uncovers secrets about Rosie.
episodes.title: Beau Soleil

episodes.synopsis: The police connect new evidence to the campaign car and to Rosie. Elsewhere, Stan and Mitch reflect on the past as their future hangs in the balance.
episodes.title: Orpheus Descending

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of Councilman Richmond being shot, Linden returns to investigate a possible cover-up but wonders who can be trusted.
episodes.title: Reflections

episodes.synopsis: Rosie's bloody backpack turns up at the Larsen house, and Linden goes to Tacoma, where she uncovers a secret about Richmond.
episodes.title: My Lucky Day

episodes.synopsis: Linden confronts Holder about Rosie's backpack. Meanwhile, Mitch has visions of Rosie, and Richmond faces the fact that he's a paraplegic.
episodes.title: Numb

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder identify the man with the tattoo. Elsewhere, Stan's mob connections continue to haunt him, and Jamie asks Gwen for help.
episodes.title: Ogi Jun

episodes.synopsis: An old voice mail from Rosie surfaces, giving Linden a fresh clue. Meanwhile, Mitch befriends a young runaway.
episodes.title: Ghosts of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Stan admits that he's not Rosie's biological father. Meanwhile, Jasper falls under suspicion, and Richmond entertains an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: Openings

episodes.synopsis: Returning to the casino, Linden makes a troubling discovery. Elsewhere, Stan agrees to publicly exonerate Richmond, and tension grips the Larsen home.
episodes.title: Keylela

episodes.synopsis: When Holder vanishes, Linden embarks on a desperate search for him. Later, Stan goes on television to solicit leads.
episodes.title: Off the Reservation

episodes.synopsis: Rosie's keys give Linden more access to the casino, and Richmond tries to help the investigation. Meanwhile, Holder goes looking for missing files.
episodes.title: Sayonara Hiawatha

episodes.synopsis: While Linden finds herself detained in a psychiatric ward, Stan tries to make amends, and Richmond mounts a comeback in the mayoral race.
episodes.title: 72 Hours

episodes.synopsis: As Linden pulls strings to get the FBI involved in the case, Stan gets entangled with Janek. Meanwhile, Richmond's attempted suicide is made public.
episodes.title: Bulldog

episodes.synopsis: On Election Day, Linden and Holder narrow the suspects down to two people. Meanwhile, the Larsens reunite and try to find a path forward.
episodes.title: Donnie or Marie

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder identify Rosie's killer. Later, a revelation from a surprising source gives the Larsens closure.
episodes.title: What I Know

episodes.synopsis: Holder catches an unsettling case. / Linden's past leads her to a grim discovery.
episodes.title: The Jungle / That You Fear the Most

episodes.synopsis: Linden joins the task force with her own agenda, and Holder finds a new street informant. Meanwhile, Seward stokes an old rivalry.
episodes.title: Seventeen

episodes.synopsis: The task force shuts down a business, and Linden and Holder unite to seek "the voice." Meanwhile, Seward is offered motivation to obey orders.
episodes.title: Head Shots

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder, with help from Bullet, race to find a victim on the run. Elsewhere, Seward is an unkind host to a surprise visitor.
episodes.title: Scared and Running

episodes.synopsis: As Bullet struggles with the truth, Linden and Holder catch up to the latest victim. Meanwhile, Seward comes face-to-face with his past.
episodes.title: Eminent Domain

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder get a break in the case. Meanwhile, Seward fights against his mortality, and Bullet takes on the role of protector.
episodes.title: Hope Kills

episodes.synopsis: The investigation kicks into high gear when Linden vanishes. Meanwhile, Bullet decides to save Lyric and learns a dark secret.
episodes.title: Try

episodes.synopsis: The hunt for the pornographer leads to an alarming revelation, and Holder seeks someone to blame. Meanwhile, Twitch and Lyric find their dream home.
episodes.title: Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: As Linden deals with the consequences of her past mistakes, Holder wrestles with personal demons, and Seward reveals the truth.
episodes.title: Six Minutes

episodes.synopsis: As Linden seeks peace, the detectives pick up a new unnerving case. / Linden risks her life when someone close to her disappears.
episodes.title: From Up Here / The Road to Hamelin

episodes.synopsis: While covering up Skinner's disappearance, Linden and Holder are assigned a new case: the brutal murder of a family with ties to a military academy.
episodes.title: Blood In The Water

episodes.synopsis: Questioning a neighbor leads to a revelation about one of the victims. Meanwhile, Reddick begins to investigate the disappearance of Lt. Skinner.
episodes.title: Unraveling

episodes.synopsis: Reddick digs deeper into Skinner’s disappearance while Linden and Holder try to keep their crime a secret and their investigation from going cold.
episodes.title: The Good Soldier

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder focus their investigation on a student with a sordid past, and a tip from an informant leads Reddick to a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Dream Baby Dream

episodes.synopsis: Information about the family murders surfaces as Kyle's memory starts to come back.  Holder's loyalty is tested when confronted about Skinner's death.
episodes.title: Truth Asunder

episodes.synopsis: Linden and Holder's partnership spirals out of control as they are confronted with the shocking truth behind the Stansbury murders.
episodes.title: Eden
